title: Hour 1: Boss Angeles
description:
Kendrick Perkins and Keyshawn Johnson join the show to react to recent comments LeBron made about this season being "win or bust." The crew also discusses Russell Westbrook parting ways with his longtime agent. Plus, they debate if can you build a team around Donavan Mitchell. Last the crew reacts to Harden taking a pay cut in order to build a title winning team.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: Is LeBron sending a message to the Lakers?
